Why email starts fights (video)

by

Posted on January 1, 2019 at 12:00 PM

I'm quite sure that in your organisation (like many...) people send tons of emails. Email is a wonderfull tool, but ... not all the time. I love this video, because it explains it very well. I show it to all my teams !

What do you think ? How do you manage it ?

Please share your experience!
